item.description:
Consider yourself warmly invited to ‘Wicked Wines of New England’ on Saturday November 10th. It will be an evening of wine tasting and traditional New England ghost stories in Stetson House barn. The night begins at 7pm and lasts until 9pm. You will be invited to try seven different wines from local wineries in Massachusetts including the Boston Winery, Nashoba Valley and Westport Vineyards among others.

Upstairs internationally acclaimed storyteller Andrea Lovett will regale you with chilling tales from New England’s past. Downstairs our wine educator will serve up the tastings. There will be local cheese made in Hanover at Meade Farm on Center Street. Tickets are $20 Non member and $15 Member. Please join us on the special night in Stetson House barn.

Reservations are required. Proper ID 21+. Please call Rachel Lovett at 781-267-3050.

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: Wicked Wines of New England
